医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
具有感官电子皮肤的下一代软机器人增强患者护理北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校的科学家们创造了配备电子皮肤和人造肌肉的创新软机器人，使它们能够感知周围环境并实时调整自己的动作，根据论文《电子皮肤启发的感知机器人》植入物”，《自然通讯》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Next- Generation-soft-robots-with-sensory-e-skin-enhance- Patient-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Next- Generation-soft-robots-with-sensory-e-skin-enhance- Patient-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11465fef-49ef-4e27-b3bf-e2987e7b9740 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 15:39:08 -0400 Next-generation soft robots with sensory e-skin enhance patient care
革命性的人工智能工具可通过全身 PET/CT 扫描检测多种癌症根据 2024 年核医学和分子影像学会年会上发表的研究，一种新颖的人工智能方法可以通过全身 PET/CT 扫描准确检测出六种不同类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Revolutionary-AI-tool-detects-multiple-cancers-in-whole-body-PETCT-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Revolutionary-AI-tool-detects-multiple-cancers-in-whole-body-PETCT-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5befadc0-4fe6-4066-85d5-a119d7462034 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 15:34:50 -0400 Revolutionary AI tool detects multiple cancers in whole-body PET/CT scans
研究人员设计水溶性组氨酸激酶以增强抗生素药物筛选一种称为组氨酸激酶的细菌酶是新型抗生素的有希望的目标。然而，开发针对这种酶的药物一直很困难，因为它是一种“疏水”蛋白质，一旦从细胞膜中的正常位置移除就会失去其结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Researchers-engineer-water-solved-histidine-kinase-for-enhanced-antibiotic-drug-screens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Researchers-engineer-water-solved-histidine-kinase-for-enhanced-antibiotic-drug-screens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2033d4ee-9b4b-4c6d-a363-07776bd2ade3 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 14:48:31 -0400 Researchers engineer water-soluble histidine kinase for enhanced antibiotic drug screens
Newcells Biotech 通过重要任命加强高管和美国团队Valeria Chichagova 博士被任命为技术总监，Colin Brown 博士被任命为首席科学官，Lyle Armstrong 教授被任命为科学顾问。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Newcells-Biotech-strengthens-executive-and-US-team-with-key-appointments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Newcells-Biotech-strengthens-executive-and-US-team-with-key-appointments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcacc9cb-0187-4493-94d2-cb4691479b50 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 09:20:00 -0400 Newcells Biotech strengthens executive and US team with key appointments

禽流感检测很难进行。那么我们如何知道何时拉响大流行警报呢？斯坦福大学传染病医生阿布拉·卡兰（Abraar Karan）最近接诊了很多流鼻涕、发烧、眼睛发炎的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Bird-flu-tests-are-hard-to-get-So-how-will-we-know-when-to-sound-the-pandemic-警报.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Bird-flu-tests-are-hard-to-get-So-how-will-we-know-when-to-sound-the-pandemic- Alarm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e808993-34f9-4fe5-a603-449d6f8d7a65 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 07:05:15 -0400 Bird flu tests are hard to get. So how will we know when to sound the pandemic alarm?
药剂师称，拜登计划为医疗保险患者节省药物费用，但可能会导致货架空空如也拜登政府旨在降低医疗保险患者药品成本的新政策实施几个月后，独立药剂师表示，他们很难负担一些处方药的库存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Biden-plan-to-save-Medicare-患者-money-on-drugs-risks-empty-shelves-pharmacists-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Biden-plan-to-save-Medicare-患者-money-on-drugs-risks-empty-shelves-pharmacists-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b473225-9857-4c0a-a5bc-d93e00558564 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 06:25:56 -0400 Biden plan to save Medicare patients money on drugs risks empty shelves, pharmacists say
极端天气条件如何影响低收入和中等收入国家的孕产妇健康？由于极端天气事件，基础设施遭到破坏，获得健康和医疗服务的机会减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/How-do-extreme-weather-conditions-impact-maternal-health-in-low-venue-and-middle-venue-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/How-do-extreme-weather-conditions-impact-maternal-health-in-low-venue-and-middle-venue-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf136249-55aa-486d-81f1-846be1a3f3f5 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 06:08:00 -0400 How do extreme weather conditions impact maternal health in low-income and middle-income countries?
